snippet: The Galaxy Player 3.6 has a readily available Wi-Fi connection, which may be its only advantage to the more powerful smartphones: you can play music, video and games without having to pay monthly cellphone service fees.
abstract: The Galaxy Player 3.6 has a readily available Wi-Fi connection, which may be its only advantage to the more powerful smartphones: you can play music, video and games without having to pay monthly cellphone service fees.

headline.main: A New Addition to Samsung's Family of Players
headline.print_headline: Looks Like a Phone, but Don’t Expect It to Ring
